contribution.deleted: The contribution has been deleted! But it will remain visible.

formText.bringYourTalentsTo: Bring your talents to the community! We reward your voluntary commitment with 20 GDD per hour up to a maximum of 1,000 GDD per month.
formText.describeYourCommunity: Describe your community service activity and specify the number of hours! The amount of 20 GDD per hour will be calculated automatically. After confirmation by a moderator, the amount will be credited to your account.
formText.maxGDDforMonth: You can only submit a maximum of {amount} GDD for the selected month.
formText.openAmountForMonth: For {monthAndYear}, you can still submit {creation} GDD.
formText.yourContribution: Your Contributions to the Common Good

noContributions.allContributions: No contributions have been submitted yet.
noContributions.myContributions: You have not submitted any entries yet.

noOpenCreation.allMonth: For all two months your creation limit is reached. The next month you can create 1000 GDD again.
noOpenCreation.lastMonth: The creation limit is reached for the selected month.
noOpenCreation.thisMonth: The creation limit has been reached for the current month.

decay.before_startblock_transaction: This transaction does not include decay.

error.email-already-sent: We already sent you an email less than 10 minutes ago.

error.no-account: Unfortunately we could not find an (activated) account to the given data.
error.no-transactionlist: Unfortunately, there was an error. No transactions have been sent from the server.
error.session-expired: The session was closed for security reasons.

form.link_decay_description: The link amount is blocked along with the maximum decay. After the link has been redeemed, expired, or deleted, the rest is released again.
form.no_gdd_available: You do not have GDD to send.
form.scann_code: QR Code Scanner - Scan the QR Code of your partner
form.send_check: Confirm your transaction. Please check all data again!
form.send_transaction_error: Unfortunately, the transaction could not be executed!

amount.decimal-places: The amount should contain a maximum of two decimal places.

amount.min: The amount should be at least {min} in size.
amount.typeError: The amount should be a number between {min} and {max} with at most two digits after the decimal point.

validation.gddSendAmount: The {_field_} field must be a number between {min} and {max} with at most two digits after the decimal point.

hours.decimal-places: The hours should contain a maximum of two decimal places.
hours.max: The hours should not be larger than {max}.
hours.min: The hours should be at least {min} in size.

memo.max: The message should not be longer than {max} characters.
memo.min: The message should be at least {min} characters long.

validation.username-allowed-chars: The username may only contain letters, numbers, hyphens or underscores.
validation.username-hyphens: Hyphens or underscores must be in between letters or numbers.

gdd_per_link.choose-amount: Select an amount you want to send via link and enter a message. The message is mandatory.
gdd_per_link.credit-your-gradido: For the Gradido to be credited, click on the link!

usersearch.headline: Geographical User Search
usersearch.text:
No matter which community you belong to, with the Geo Matching System you can find members of all communities on a map. You can filter according to offers and needs and display the users that match you.

The button opens a new browser window in which the users in your area are displayed on a map.
